actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution condemning violations of rights by the Government of the Republic of Uganda and urging the President to take certain actions with respect to those violations.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that the Congress strongly condemns the gross violations of human rights and other suppressive acts committed by Idi Amin and the Government of the Republic of Uganda. Urges the President to (1) support and implement measures, such as an embargo, which would effectively discourage United States support of Uganda, and (2) encourage and support international efforts to investigate and respond to conditions in that country, including economic restrictions.

titles.title: A resolution condemning violations of rights by the Government of the Republic of Uganda and urging the President to take certain actions with respect to those violations.
